title: Counting sign changes in a word over real numbers

blocks.name: signslema
blocks.content: Computational part of signwlemn . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm signslema(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wbr(c2, clt, c3), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c3), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cpr(nat0, nat2)))
} = {
  jca(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
  mpjaodan(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c2, clt, c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0), wbr(c2, clt, c3))
  3bitr4rd(wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0)), wbr(c2, clt, c3), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c3, cmin, c2)))
  breq2d(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c3, cmin, c2), wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0), wb(wbr(c2, clt, c3), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  lttrd(nat0, co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c3, cmin, c2), wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2)))
  0red(wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wcel(co(c3, cmin, c2), cr))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cr))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c3, cmin, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wbr(c2, clt, c3))
  simpld(w0, wbr(c2, clt, c3), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wb(wbr(c2, clt, c3), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
  posdifd(c2, c3, w0)
  sylan2(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wbr(co(c3, cmin, c2), clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
  mpbiri(wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2))), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  breq2(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2, nat0, clt)
  biimpar(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2))), wbr(co(c3, cmin, c2), clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  posdifd(co(c3, cmin, c2), co(c1, cmin, c0), w0)
  resubcld(c3, c2, w0)
  nn0red(c3, w0)
  nn0red(c2, w0)
  resubcld(c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
  posdifd(c0, c1, w0)
  nn0red(c0, w0)
  nn0red(c1, w0)
  mpjaodan(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2))
  mtbird(wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
  breq2d(nat2, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c3, cmin, c2), wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0)))
  biimpa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0), wceq(co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c3, cmin, c2)))
  subeq0ad(co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c3, cmin, c2), w0)
  mtbid(wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(co(c3, cmin, c2), caddc, nat2)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(co(c3, cmin, c2), caddc, nat2))))
  mtbid(w0, wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(co(c3, cmin, c2), caddc, nat2)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c2)))
  simprd(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c2))), wbr(c2, clt, c3))
  sylancr(w0, wb(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c2)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(co(c3, cmin, c2), caddc, nat2))), wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(co(c3, cmin, c2), cz))
  2z()
  zsubcld(c3, c2, w0)
  nn0zd(c3, w0)
  nn0zd(c2, w0)
  dvdsaddr(nat2, co(c3, cmin, c2))
  breq2d(nat2, cdvds, co(co(c3, cmin, c2), caddc, nat2), co(c1, cmin, c0), wa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2)))
  biimpa(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2), wceq(co(co(c3, cmin, c2), caddc, nat2), co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  subaddd(co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c3, cmin, c2), nat2, w0)
  subcld(c1, c0, w0)
  subcld(c3, c2, w0)
  2cnd(w0)
  sylib(w0, wo(wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat2)), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), cpr(nat0, nat2)))
  eqeltrrd(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), cpr(nat0, nat2), co(co(c1, cmin, c3), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c2)), w0)
  sub4d(c1, c3, c0, c2, w0)
  nn0cnd(c1, w0)
  nn0cnd(c3, w0)
  nn0cnd(c0, w0)
  nn0cnd(c2, w0)
  elpr(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), nat0, nat2)
  ovex(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2))
}

thm signstfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s2, s3, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s2), cv(s3), wceq(cv(s3), nat0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s4, cword(cr), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s4))), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s4, cword(cr), csu(s5, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s4))), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s4)), cv(s5)), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s4)), co(cv(s5), cmin, nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), wceq(c3, cmpo(s2, s3, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s2), cv(s3), wceq(cv(s3), nat0)))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), wceq(c4, cmpt(s4, cword(cr), csu(s5, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s4))), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s4)), cv(s5)), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s4)), co(cv(s5), cmin, nat1))))))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  fvmpt(s4, c0, cword(cr), c1, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s4))), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s1)))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s4))), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s1))))), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s4), c0))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s4)), cfv(chash, c0), wceq(cv(s4), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s4), c0, chash)
  oveq2d(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s1)))), cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s4), c0))
  mpteq2dva(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s1))), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s4), c0))
  fveq2d(csgn, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wa(wceq(cv(s4), c0), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)))))
  fveq1d(cv(s4), cv(s1), c0, wa(wceq(cv(s4), c0), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)))))
  simpl(wceq(cv(s4), c0), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0))))
  mptex(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.cword.s(s4, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s4)
  diff.cmpt.s(s4, s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  diff.co.s(s4, nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.cfzo.s(s4)
  diff.cfv.s(s4, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s4)
  diff.co.s(s4, c2, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  diff.cgsu.s(s4)
  diff.cmpt.s(s4, s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  diff.co.s(s4, nat0, cfz, cv(s0))
  diff.nat0.s(s4)
  diff.cfz.s(s4)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s4, csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  diff.csgn.s(s4)
  diff.cfv.s(s4, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s4, s1)
  diffss.ex(s4, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s4), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s4)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s4), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s4)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfzo.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
}

thm signstfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), c1), co(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s1, s2, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s1), cv(s2), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))))
  -| wceq(c3, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, cword(cr), cmpt(s4, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s3))), co(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s4)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s3), cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s3, cword(cr), csu(s5, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s3))), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cv(s5)), cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), co(cv(s5), cmin, nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c3)
} = {
  fvmptd(s4, cfv(c2, c0), c1, co(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s4)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cmpt(s4, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s4)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))))
  signstfv(s4, s0, s1, s2, s3, s5, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  oveq2d(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s4)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(cv(s4), c1)))
  mpteq1d(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s4)), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), co(nat0, cfz, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(cv(s4), c1)))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfz, cv(s4), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(cv(s4), c1)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(cv(s4), c1))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  ovexd(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  diff.co.s(s4, c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.cgsu.s(s4)
  diff.cmpt.s(s4, s0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), cfv(csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.co.s(s4, nat0, cfz, c1)
  diff.cfz.s(s4)
  diff.cfv.s(s4, csgn, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.csgn.s(s4)
  diff.cfv.s(s4, c0, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s4, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s4, wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s4, c0, cword(cr))
  diff.cword.s(s4, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s4, c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  diff.co.s(s4, nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.nat0.s(s4)
  diff.cfzo.s(s4)
  diff.cfv.s(s4, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s4)

  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s2, cword(cr), cmpt(s3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), co(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s4, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s3)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))))))))

  -| diffsc(s4, c3)

blocks.name: signsvtn0
blocks.content: If the last letter is nonzero, then this is the zero-skipping sign. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Nov-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm signsvtn0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

blocks.name: signstfvneq0
blocks.content: In case the first letter is not zero, the zero skipping sign is never zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: signsvvfval
blocks.content: The value of ` V ` , which represents the number of times the sign changes in a word. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm signsvvfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(c2, c0), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s1, s2, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s1), cv(s2), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, cword(cr), cmpt(s4, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s3))), co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s5, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s4)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s3), cv(s5))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s3, cword(cr), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s3))), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c4)
  -| diffsc(s5, c0)
  -| diffsc(s5, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(c2, c0), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1))))))), wceq(c3, cmpo(s1, s2, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s1), cv(s2), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))))

  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(c2, c0), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1))))))), wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, cword(cr), cmpt(s4, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s3))), co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s5, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s4)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s3), cv(s5)))))))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(c2, c0), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1))))))), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(c2, c0), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1))))))), diffss(s3, s4))

blocks.name: signsvtp
blocks.content: Adding a letter of the same sign as the highest coefficient does not change the sign. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s0), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s2, cword(cr), cmpt(s3, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s4, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s3)), cfv(csgn, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cmpt(s2, cword(cr), csu(s5, co(nat1, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), cif(nat1, nat0, wne(cfv(cfv(c5, cv(s2)), cv(s5)), cfv(cfv(c5, cv(s2)), co(cv(s5), cmin, nat1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(co(cs1(nat0), cconcat, c0), cof(cmin), co(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(nat0)), cofc(cmul), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c4)
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, crp)), wne(c2, emptycls), wne(cfv(chash, c2), nat0))
  nnne0d(cfv(chash, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, crp)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(chash, c2), cn, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, crp)))
  signshlen(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, crp)), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), cn), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  lencl(c0, cr)
  nn0p1nn(cfv(chash, c0))
  necon3bid(cfv(chash, c2), nat0, c2, emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, crp)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cr)), wcel(c1, crp)), wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, emptycls)), wcel(c2, cword(cr)))
  signshwrd(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  hasheq0(c2, cword(cr))
}

thm signshnz(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Word(ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→ c2 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ { -u(1), 0, 1 }, s1 ∈ { -u(1), 0, 1 } ↦ if(s1 = 0, s0, s1))
  ⊣ c4 = { <(Base ` ndx), { -u(1), 0, 1 } >, <(+ ` ndx), c3 > }
  ⊣ c5 =(s2 ∈ Word(ℝ)↦(s3 ∈(0[..^](# ` s2))↦(c4[gsum](s4 ∈(0[...]s3)↦(sgn `(s2 ` s4))))))
  ⊣ c6 =(s2 ∈ Word(ℝ)↦ sum(s5 ∈(1[..^](# ` s2)), if(((c5 ` s2)` s5)≠((c5 ` s2)`(s5[-]1)), 1, 0)))
  ⊣ c2 =((<" 0 ">[++]c0)[oF(-)]((c0[++]<" 0 ">)[oFC(×)]c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c4)
  ⊣ d(s4, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c4)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ∈ Word(ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), c2 ≠ ∅, (# ` c2)≠ 0)
  nnne0d((# ` c2), (c0 ∈ Word(ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+))
  eqeltrd((# ` c2), cn, ((# ` c0)[+]1), (c0 ∈ Word(ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+))
  signshlen(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  syl((c0 ∈ Word(ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), ((# ` c0)[+]1)∈ ℕ, (# ` c0)∈ ℕ0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Word(ℝ), c1 ∈ ℝ+, (# ` c0)∈ ℕ0)
  lencl(c0, cr)
  nn0p1nn((# ` c0))
  necon3bid((# ` c2), nat0, c2, emptycls, (c0 ∈ Word(ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+))
  syl((c0 ∈ Word(ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), ((# ` c2)= 0 ↔ c2 = ∅), c2 ∈ Word(ℝ))
  signshwrd(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  hasheq0(c2, Word(ℝ))
}
